events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return it and get a refund because it isn't what I expected.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund case based on their return and refund inquiry.
Assigning the refund case to the customer support agent specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you'd like to return your order and receive a refund. I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can assist you properly with the refund process?
My order number is 123456789, and I want to return the item because it didn't match the description on the website.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the item back within 14 days, and I'll provide a prepaid shipping label.
That sounds great, thank you! I will send the item back using the prepaid label as soon as I receive it.
We have received your returned item, and your refund has been processed successfully. Please allow 3-5 business days for it to appear on your payment method.
Just following up to confirm that you received your refund and to see if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund issue has been resolved and there were no further questions, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting us.
